nodes.text: The Trandoshan blaster was a blaster rifle used by the Trandoshans.

Garnac's hunting guild used this blaster during the Clone Wars on the moon Wasskah around 21 BBY. He and his hunters installed a special device in these blasters. If a prisoner on Wasskah had possession of one of these blasters with the device, the blaster would disable itself. The Ohnaka Gang also made use of these weapons.

This weapon was also used during the Galactic Civil War. Sometime after the Battle of Yavin, a group of Trandoshans, led by the notorious bounty hunter Bossk, used these blasters during Han Solo's mission to Kashyyyk.
